description: Name of the parsed source file from which this text chunk was extracted.
ID of the text chunk within the original file (used to reconstruct full pages).
Internal numeric ID of the URL in the global link list.
Full URL of the webpage.
Standardized institution name matched to the Times Higher Education (THE) dataset.
Harmonized country name of the institution.
Language code of the page text detected by LangDetect (e.g. 'en', 'es').
Confidence score from LangDetect for the detected language (0–1).
Indicator whether any of the project’s AI-related keywords appear in the page content (yes/no).
Semicolon-separated list of AI-related keywords found in the page content.
Most frequent individual words in the cleaned page text.
Most frequent two-word phrases in the cleaned page text.
Most frequent three-word phrases in the cleaned page text.
Total number of words in the cleaned page text.
Page title, taken from the HTML <title> or a similar field.
Main textual content of the webpage after boilerplate removal.
Institution rank from the THE ranking (for the relevant year).
THE 'Industry income' score for the institution.
Original institution name as it appears in the THE source file.
Number of students at the institution (from THE data).
THE 'Research' score for the institution.
Number of full-time equivalent staff at the institution (from THE data).
Duplicate of 'the_rank', kept for technical checks and joins.
Main institutional internet domain from THE data (e.g. 'uni-xyz.de').
THE 'Teaching' score for the institution.
Female-to-male student ratio (from THE data).
Overall THE score for the institution.
THE 'International outlook' score for the institution.
Country name exactly as given in the original THE source.
Final content label(s) assigned to the page by our classification scheme (e.g. research materials, university material, news, events, etc.).
